alert.note: Alert for Middle Tanana Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 08 at 4:01PM AKST until March 09 at 6:00PM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM AKST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed freezing rain, sleet and snow. Ice accumulations of a light glaze, and snow accumulations of 3 to 4 inches are expected. * WHERE...Middle Tanana Valley. * WHEN...Until 6 PM AKST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery driving and walking surfaces. Travel could become difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Mixed freezing rain, sleet and snow will Continue this afternoon. A light glaze of ice is expected. The precipitation will change to all snow about 6pm this evening with snow continue into Thursday. Snow will taper off Thursday evening.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
